name: 6 Day Tour Of Cusco-Sacred Valley-Classic Inca Trail Trek
description: This combined tour will take you to the most interesting attractions around Cusco and the Sacred Valley before you embark on the world famous Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. After your tour of the Sacred Valley, you will spend the night in the charming town of Ollantaytambo, allowing you to take in the Incan architecture and get a longer nights sleep before departing on the Inca Trail the following day.
